TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITrackingPersonalizable

summary.span: 可讓 Web 組件控制項追蹤個人化載入和儲存過程的特定階段。

span.span: Allows Web Parts controls to track the specific phases of the personalization load and save process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面可讓控制項開發人員追蹤個人化生命週期，包括載入和儲存的個人化資料的不同階段。This interface allows control developers to track different phases of the personalization life cycle, including the loading and saving of personalization data. 在大部分的情況下，您也會在使用這個介面建立自訂或和實作這個介面。In most cases, to use this interface you would create a custom or and implement this interface. 此外，需要管理他們自己的變更 （「 有所變更 」） 追蹤的控制項應該實作這個介面。Additionally, controls that need to manage their own change ("dirty") tracking should implement this interface. 管理他們自己的變更追蹤的控制項應該傳回`true`從屬性。Controls that manage their own change tracking should return `true` from the property. 如果`false`傳回，則 ASP.NET 負責決定藉由比較屬性資訊的變更載入已儲存的內容資訊。If `false` is returned, then ASP.NET is responsible for determining changes by comparing the property information loaded with the property information that was saved. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法和屬性來載入及儲存個人化資訊的追蹤。The following code example demonstrates using methods and properties to track the loading and saving of personalization information. 此範例包含兩個部分，.aspx 網頁和應放在 App_Code 子目錄中的檔案。The example consists of two parts, an .aspx page and a file that should be placed in an App_Code subdirectory. 下列程式碼範例會建立 Web 組件控制項，可讓使用者輸入的 URL 資訊並將儲存這個使用者的資訊。The following code example creates a Web Parts control that allows a user to enter URL information and saves this information for the user. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/CS/persdict.cs#9)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/VB/persdict.vb#9)] 下列的.aspx 網頁建立網頁組件區域，並將控制項新增至區域。The following .aspx page creates a Web Parts zone and adds the control to the zone. 頁面也會參考您應該用來登入個別的使用者，以便可以套用個人化的登入控制項。The page also references a login control that you should use to log on individual users so that personalization can be applied. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/CS/defaultcs.aspx#10)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void BeginLoad() cil managed

summary.span: 表示個人化資訊載入階段的開始。

span.span: Represents the beginning of the load phase for personalization information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件控制項集合會呼叫這個方法之前套用個人化資料。The Web Parts control set calls this method prior to applying personalization data. 會追蹤變更狀態的控制項應該使用這個方法來設定內部的旗標，指出屬性不應該呼叫。A control that tracks its own change state should use this method to set an internal flag indicating that properties should not call . 這是因為個人化資料，之後呼叫的應用程式時，可以呼叫屬性設定方法。This is because property-setting methods can be called during the application of personalization data, subsequent to the call to . 在大部分情況下，控制項應該不會考慮變更 （「 中途 」），因為它可個人化的屬性已設定根據從基礎資料存放區載入的資料。In most scenarios, a control should not be considered changed ("dirty") just because its personalizable properties have been set based on data loaded from the underlying data store. > [!NOTE] > 匯入 Web 組件控制項之後套用個人化資料時，也可以呼叫這個方法。This method is also called when personalization data is applied after importing a Web Parts control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 完整的工作的程式碼範例，包含控制項和.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀主題。For a complete, working code example that consists of a control and an .aspx page, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/CS/persdict.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/VB/persdict.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void BeginSave() cil managed

summary.span: 表示擷取控制項個人化資料之前的階段。

span.span: Represents the phase prior to extracting personalization data from a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件控制項集合會呼叫這個方法之前從控制項擷取個人化資料。The Web Parts control set calls this method prior to extracting personalization data from the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 完整的工作的程式碼範例，包含控制項和.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀主題。For a complete, working code example that consists of a control and an .aspx page, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/CS/persdict.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/VB/persdict.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EndLoad() cil managed

summary.span: 表示已將個人化資料套用至控制項之後的階段。

span.span: Represents the phase after personalization data has been applied to a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件控制項設定的呼叫這個方法之後個人化資料已套用至控制項。The Web Parts control set calls this method after personalization data has been applied to the control. 會追蹤其變更狀態的控制項應該使用這個方法來重設其內部狀態，以指出後續屬性設定方法應該呼叫。A control that tracks its change state should use this method to reset its internal state to indicate that subsequent property-setting methods should call . 依時間方法呼叫、 Web 組件控制項集合已完成個人化資料的任何應用程式的控制項。By the time the method is called, the Web Parts control set has completed any application of personalization data to the control. 如此一來，後續變更控制項的狀態應視為有效的指標，可控制已變更 （為 「 有所變更 」）。As a result, subsequent changes to the control's state should be considered valid indicators that the control has changed (is "dirty"). > [!NOTE] > 匯入 Web 組件控制項之後套用個人化資料時，也可以呼叫這個方法。This method is also called when personalization data is applied after importing a Web Parts control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 完整的工作的程式碼範例，包含控制項和.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀主題。For a complete, working code example that consists of a control and an .aspx page, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/CS/persdict.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/VB/persdict.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EndSave() cil managed

summary.span: 表示擷取控制項個人化資料之後的階段。

span.span: Represents the phase after personalization data has been extracted from a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件控制項設定已從控制項擷取個人化資料之後，這個方法的呼叫。The Web Parts control set calls this method after personalization data has been extracted from the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 完整的工作的程式碼範例，包含控制項和.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀主題。For a complete, working code example that consists of a control and an .aspx page, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/CS/persdict.cs#7)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/VB/persdict.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TracksChanges As Boolean
public: property bool TracksChanges { bool get(); };

summary.span: 指出控制項是否追蹤其變更狀態。

span.span: Indicates whether the control tracks the status of its changes.

value.span: 如果 Web 組件控制項負責判斷何時將控制項視為已變更 ("dirty")，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the Web Parts control is responsible for determining when the control is considered changed ("dirty"); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項傳回`true`從這個屬性，則 Web 組件控制項的必須決定當它會考慮本身 「 有所變更 」。If a control returns `true` from this property, then it is the Web Parts control's responsibility to determine when it considers itself "dirty." 如果控制項可讓您判斷已變更 （即 「 有所變更 」），必須呼叫控制項本身。If a control determines that it has changed (is "dirty"), that control must call on itself. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性。The following code example demonstrates setting the property. 完整的工作的程式碼範例，包含控制項和.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀主題。For a complete, working code example that consists of a control and an .aspx page, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/CS/persdict.cs#8)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/VB/persdict.vb#8)]
